reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Gave these a shot because of the price and I regret it. Every single one of them has my can lights flickering. They are very easy to install but that does not matter as they do not work. FYI, I am a professional remodeler and have never had this issue with Lutron dimmers. The customer I was working for wanted to save some money and it ended up costing them more as I had to replace every dimmer with one that actually works.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2025
reviews.title: Not worth it at any price

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Easy to install and everything you need is included. The switch itself has a satisfying snap that is absent from a lot of switches these days, and the dimmer has just the right amount of resistance. Half a year after installation, they still work and feel the same. Great value too.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2025
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Just installed. So far, so good. Paired with Feit LED bulbs. Did not notice humming or experience flicker at low dim yet.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The rocker part of th switch pivots on two points that are l 1/8" or less. 2 of the 6 I have purchased have had one side break off. So probably only 3 to 4 months of use. They were installed in the bathrooms. And 2 in my kids bedrooms.and in 1 kitchen light. Had 1 spare that was used to replace in the bathroom. I bought similar rocker panel switches for my entire house, just reg switches and no problem. Might be a different brand. I guess they work great as long as you don't over use them.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2025
reviews.title: Switched off!!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I can’t stop buying these! They’re great, compact dimmers and fit well even in older boxes. I rehab houses and own multiple rentals. I like to replace old ceiling fixtures with really bright LED fixtures and replace the switch with a dimmer. I’ve used various LED bulbs and fixtures and haven’t had any flickering.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
reviews.title: Great quality for the price

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The dimmer worked fine. The low setting was not quite as low as I would have wanted, but still within reason. The bad part is that the box containing the electronics is HUGE! I didn't know my electrical box is the shallow type & there was no way to position the wires and get the switch pushed all the way in. They sell another model that is slimmer that I'll be buying (now that I know!). I just don't understand why they don't make them all that way!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2025
reviews.title: Good, but TOO DEEP

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Dimmer selector is a little sharp on the edges easy to hurt your finger when you’re switching. The light on I prefer vertical and smooth selector.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
reviews.title: Slider button is not comfortable to hurt finger.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: First day I had 13 installed. I didn't notice any humming, flicker or being unable to dim to zero. You need to adjust the wheel. I did notice I had to swap out some bulbs if you have multiple bulb fixtures. I'll keep an eye on them over time and report back any issues. The bottom line is they work great for the price. Like others said they are a bit big to jam into the gang box, but I let the electrician do that. They only charged me $150 for all 13 switches. Not wasting my time for the install price. I also have 3 spares, so if one dies over time I can replace with same dimmer.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2024
reviews.title: Pretty good for the price

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Configuration and location of the wires is inconvenient and makes it difficult to install this in anything less than a deep box. The flicker control is flimsy and imprecise at best. When installed on multiple fixtures on the same circuit, it's impossible to eliminate flicker entirely. Spend a little more, and purchase switches with screw connections.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2024
reviews.title: Unnecessarily large, poor flicker control

reviews.text: Bought a pack of six and a pack of two to replace old dimmers in the house and add a few new one. Noticed that the rocker in one of the switches is unstable and doesn’t turn the light on half of the time. Returned the pack of two which contained the faulty switch and installed the rest. Now after about 2 months of use, other switches are starting to show same symptoms one by one. It is too late to return them. Stay away from this brand and save money and time.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2024
reviews.title: Low quality, stopped working after 2 months

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: If you're going to install to install one units individually, this product will work fine. Nice looking when stand alone & it's easy to control. However, the problem rise if you're going to install two units together next to each other as the metal frame is too wide for the units be next to each other. Because the electric box frame is certain size, the wide metal frame that surrounds the switch will make it virtually impossible to be placed next to each other and fit under two units wall plate. Most of times, you would want the two units together in one place, but without removing the metal plate, this would be impossible.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.title: Dimmer OK

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: This dimmer is defective and not compatible some recessed LED lights. My two LED lights are connected to one dimmer switch and when moved to very low setting, the lights start flickering and automatically turns off between 2min to 3min. Another switch connected to 6 LED lights and when moved to very low setting, four lights turns off and 2 lights keeps illuminated. I asked my contractor to install a Lutron dimmer and corrected the situation! They are way more expansive but they work everytime on any kind of lights.... It didn't work for me and will be returning back to Amazon.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.title: Not Compatible with all LED recessed lights

reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought the 5 pack and waited too long to install them. So my return window has closed. Although they are rated for LED fixtures there is constant flickering. There is an adjustment dial which initially worked. But 5 min later a harsh flicker resumes. I tried 3 of them on 3 different fixtures. Now the good deal is $55 thrown away. Save your time and just do it right the first time. I wish I had seen a review like this before I purchased these.

reviews.text: I am using these switches on LED lights, but have not been anywhere close to overloading them per the specifications. One switch had a total load of 36 watts, and initially worked OK, but now the dimming switch doesn't do anything. This happened again on 2 other switches. I do not recommend these switches and will pursue the warranty.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way, for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 120V, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Beginning to replace the 13 a rocker dimmer switches installed by our electrician on our new home. The reasons I bought Bestten switch :1) looked like it would be an exact replacement for current switch. Looks ok and works. 2) at about $10 they are half the cost of a Levittown dimmer rocker. The bad news is the current rocker switches made in China are poorly made ( the plastic rocker breaks and the switch has a ball bearing that falls out when the plastic cracks…. The Bestten switch is also made in China, looks like it is built the same; and is similarly cheap. I expect some will fail in 2 years The durability ? Too early to tell…. Relatively easy to replace. Maybe Bestten made the plastic stronger?
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2021
reviews.title: Bestten Rocker Dimmer switch Review
